name: Angler Management
description:
Made for Nokia 3310 Jam 3. Optional theme ON/OFF

CONTROLS

Movement -- Arrow keys

Bite -- Space

Lure -- X 

You are a deep sea angler fish. Swim around and turn "ON"  your lure to attract food, but make sure to turn it "OFF" if any sharks are near. Try not to bite onto any fishing hooks. 

P.S. -- I reccomend downloading the ZIP file rather than playing in browser.
